scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/web
scripts.format: npm run format -w apps/api && npm run format -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test:db:reset && npm run test:integration -w apps/api
